title: Breaking my heart
lyrics: ..... ...... ...... ....... ....... .......... ...... .....I’m on the floor Counting one minute more .......Noone to break the si lence... ....... ___Staring into the night All a lone but that’s al right It’s the feeling deep in side I don’t like There is n o ex cuse my friend For breaking my heart Breaking my heart a gain This is where our journey ends Your breaking my heart a gain .....Here in my bed Counting the words you're said .....They linger in the shadows... ....... Coming home late at night Drunk again but that's alright It's the look in your eyes I don't like
